casebody.data:
Loren Pernell HENDERSON
v.
COUNTY OF MECKLENBURG State of North Carolina. No. 553P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 2, 2004.

Loren Pernell Henderson, Pro Se.

William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State.

AMENDED ORDER

Upon consideration of the application filed by Plaintiff on the 26th day of October 2004 in this matter for Peremptory Writ of Mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Mecklenburg County:

"Denied by order of the Court in Conference this the 2nd day of December 2004."
